openPositions.title: Senior SAP S/4HANA Consultant
openPositions.summary: Join our team as a Senior SAP S/4HANA Consultant and help leading organizations transform their business operations.
responsibilities: Lead SAP S/4HANA implementation projects from blueprint to go-live
Configure and customize SAP modules according to business requirements
Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior consultants
Collaborate with clients to understand business processes and requirements
Conduct system testing, user training, and post-go-live support
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
5+ years of hands-on SAP S/4HANA implementation experience
Strong knowledge of SAP modules (FI/CO, MM, SD, PP, etc.)
Experience with SAP Activate methodology
Excellent communication and client-facing skills
SAP certification preferred
Willingness to travel to client sites as needed

openPositions.title: SAP ABAP Developer
openPositions.summary: We're looking for a skilled ABAP Developer to join our development team and create custom solutions for our clients.
responsibilities: Develop custom ABAP programs, reports, and interfaces
Create and maintain SAP enhancements and modifications
Develop integration solutions using SAP PI/PO and APIs
Perform code reviews and ensure development best practices
Support system upgrades and technical troubleshooting
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of SAP ABAP development experience
Strong knowledge of ABAP Objects, ALV, and SmartForms
Experience with SAP integration technologies
Understanding of SAP development lifecycle
Good analytical and problem-solving skills

openPositions.title: SAP Functional Consultant (FI/CO)
openPositions.summary: Join our consulting team as an SAP FI/CO Functional Consultant and help clients optimize their financial processes.
responsibilities: Configure and implement SAP FI/CO modules
Analyze business requirements and design solutions
Conduct workshops and training sessions with clients
Support system testing and user acceptance testing
Provide post-implementation support and optimization
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field
4+ years of SAP FI/CO functional experience
Strong understanding of financial and controlling processes
Experience with SAP S/4HANA Finance preferred
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Professional accounting qualification preferred (ACCA, CIMA, etc.)

openPositions.title: SAP Project Manager
openPositions.summary: Lead complex SAP implementation projects and ensure successful delivery for our global clients.
responsibilities: Manage end-to-end SAP implementation projects
Coordinate project teams and stakeholders
Develop project plans, timelines, and budgets
Monitor project progress and manage risks
Ensure quality delivery within scope, time, and budget
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, IT, or related field
6+ years of SAP project management experience
PMP or PRINCE2 certification preferred
Strong leadership and team management skills
Experience with SAP Activate methodology
Excellent stakeholder management abilities
